Q: how to add an assistant? 
 A: the assistant should sign up in the app as an assistant and choose the copy center that he wants to work for after that a message is sent to the owner in the assistants section where he can accept or refuse the assistant’s request. 

 Q: how to remove an assistant?
 A: the owner only has the ability to remove an assistant by going to the assistants section and remove the assistant that he wants to remove. 

 Q: can I change the faculties that the copy center serve?
 A: yes in the side bar menu go to center’s data and there you can change the faculties. (only the owner can do that) 

 Q: what is the order number related to?
 A: the order number is divided into 3 parts eg. 13 D M 
 1) The number is a systematic number starts from 1 at 12 AM and increases until the next 12 AM. 
 2) The first letter indicates in which day the order has been made starting from Saturday (letter A) and ends with Friday (letter G). 
 3) The second letter is a random letter to make the order number unique.
